metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, She Sells Sanctuary has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
She Sells Sanctuary is written in the key of D Mixolydian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 5th most popular key among Mixolydian keys and     the 30th most popular  among all keys. The D Mixolydian scale is similar to the D Major scale except that its 7th note (C) is a half step lower.  Mixolydian chord progressions are heavily featured in many genres of music like classic rock, which relies on the major chord built on the 7th scale degree. 

See the D Mixolydian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
